item.title: Welcome
item.description: Researching My main focus is the creation of a Japanese philosophy-inspired design framework to think further the relation between design and appropriation, contributing to Transforming Practices. I am also co-organising the seminar Mediums in design with Annie Gentès, CY École de design. ⌈publications · events⌋ Teaching My current courses focus on design research, reflective practices, and digital skills for professional transition. I am also responsible for the Master in design in residence at Mobilier national.
